methods.Synopsis: Requires Authentication. This method returns details of the authenticated user.

parameters.Description: The access token returned from the authentication process. This token needs to have READ access.
parameters.Name: access_token

methods.Synopsis: Requires Authentication. You can update various user account settings (examples: update email address and privacy settings).

parameters.Description: The access token returned from the authentication process. This tokens needs to have WRITE scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

parameters.Description: Must be a valid email address
parameters.Name: email

parameters.Description: New password for this user - must be between 6 and 20 characters
parameters.Name: password

parameters.Description: Confirmation of new password - must match password
parameters.Name: password_confirmation

parameters.Description: Must be less than 64 characters
parameters.Name: username

parameters.Description: Image to use as this user's avatar
parameters.Name: avatar

parameters.Description: Full name of this user - must be less than 255 characters
parameters.Name: fullname

parameters.Description: Where this user is located - must be less than 255 characters
parameters.Name: location

parameters.Description: An extended description of the user and her background - must be less than 2,408 characters
parameters.Name: bio

parameters.Description: An abbreviated description of the user - must be less than 255 characters
parameters.Name: headline

parameters.Description: A URL to a website for this user - must be less than 1024 characters
parameters.Name: url

parameters.Description: Whether to send notifications for new touts from this user's followers
parameters.Name: notifications

methods.MethodName: Retrieve authorizations for the authenticated user
methods.Synopsis: Requires Authentication. This method returns detail of the 3rd party networks the user has authenticated.

methods.MethodName: Add an authorization for the authenticated user
methods.Synopsis: Authenication required. This method allows the authenticated user of your app to authorize connections to 3rd party networks including Facebook and Twitter.

methods.MethodName: Delete an authorization on behalf of the authenticated user
methods.Synopsis: Authentication Required. This method allows the authenticated user of your app to delete authorized connections to 3rd party networks.

methods.MethodName: Retrieve a list of friends via 3rd party networks
methods.Synopsis: Returns a list of Tout users the user knows through other social media. Use this for suggesting to the user other Tout users they may want to follow.

methods.MethodName: Retrieve a list of Touts from the authenticated user
methods.Synopsis: Requires Authentication. Returns all Touts for the authenticated user of the app.

methods.MethodName: Retrieve a list of Touts liked by the authenticated user
methods.Synopsis: Requires Authentication. Returns all Touts liked by the authenticated user of the app.
Requires Authentication. Returns sharing settings for a given service (currently limited to facebook).
Authentication required. Update the authenticated user's sharing settings for a given service (currently limited to facebook).

methods.MethodName: Retrieve Touts from the hashtags and users followed by a given user
methods.Synopsis: Authentication required. Use this method to retrieve all Touts associated to the hashtags and users that the specific user is currently following on the Tout platform. (This allows you to pull the user’s custom “My Stream”).

parameters.Description: The access token you received through the authentication process. This token needs to have READ scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

parameters.Description: The order in which the users are sorted. Must be one of the following: most_recent_first, oldest_first, or most_popular.
parameters.Name: order

parameters.Description: The number of users to return per page.
parameters.Name: per_page

parameters.Description: The page of users to start on.
parameters.Name: page

methods.Synopsis: Returns a list of hashtags with a given search term.

parameters.Description: The access token you received during the authentication process. This token needs to have READ scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

parameters.Description: The term to search by. This parameter must be properly url-encoded and may use + in place of spaces
parameters.Name: q

parameters.Description: The number of results to return per page.
parameters.Name: per_page

parameters.Description: The page of results to start on.
parameters.Name: page

methods.Synopsis: Returns a list of Touts with a given search term.

parameters.Description: The access token you received during the authentication process. This token needs to have READ scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

parameters.Description: The term to search by. This parameter must be properly url-encoded and may use + in place of spaces
parameters.Name: q

parameters.Description: The number of results to return per page.
parameters.Name: per_page

parameters.Description: The page of results to start on.
parameters.Name: page

methods.Synopsis: Returns a list of hashtags with a given search term.

parameters.Description: The access token you received during the authentication process. This token needs to have READ scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

parameters.Description: The term to search by. This parameter must be properly url-encoded and may use + in place of spaces
parameters.Name: q

parameters.Description: The number of results to return per page.
parameters.Name: per_page

parameters.Description: The page of results to start on.
parameters.Name: page

methods.Synopsis: Returns a user object for a specified user, including their avatar images, number of followers, bio and other detail.

parameters.Description: The uid of the user.
parameters.Name: uid

parameters.Description: The access token you received during the authentication process. This token needs to have READ scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

methods.Synopsis: Allow the authenticated user of your app update details in their Tout account profile

parameters.Description: The uid of the user.
parameters.Name: uid

parameters.Description: The access token you received during the authentication process. This token needs to have WRITE scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

parameters.Description: Where this user is located
parameters.Name: location

methods.Synopsis: This method allows a Tout user of your app to follow another Tout user.

parameters.Description: The uid of the user to follow
parameters.Name: uid

parameters.Description: The access token you received during the authentication process. This token needs to have WRITE scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

methods.Synopsis: This method allows the user of your app to unfollow a user.

parameters.Description: The uid of the user to unfollow
parameters.Name: uid

parameters.Description: The access token you received during the authentication process. This token needs to have WRITE scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

methods.Synopsis: Provide the username and retrieve a list of Touts previously liked on the Tout platform by that specific user.

parameters.Description: The uid of the user.
parameters.Name: uid

parameters.Description: The access token you received during the authentication process. This token needs to have READ scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

parameters.Description: The order in which the Touts are sorted. Must be one of the following: most_recent_first, oldest_first, most_popular.
parameters.Name: order

parameters.Description: The number of Touts to return per page.
parameters.Name: per_page

parameters.Description: The page of Touts to start on.
parameters.Name: page

methods.Synopsis: Tout users can follow each other. This method gets a list of a user’s followers.

parameters.Description: The uid of the user.
parameters.Name: uid

parameters.Description: The access token you received during the authentication process. This token needs to have READ scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

parameters.Description: The order in which the Touts are sorted. Must be one of the following: most_recent_first, oldest_first, most_popular.
parameters.Name: order

parameters.Description: The number of Touts to return per page.
parameters.Name: per_page

parameters.Description: The page of Touts to start on.
parameters.Name: page

methods.Synopsis: This method returns a paginated list of the specified user’s Touts.

parameters.Description: The uid of the user.
parameters.Name: uid

parameters.Description: The access token you received during the authentication process. This token needs to have READ scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

parameters.Description: The order in which the Touts are sorted. Must be one of the following: most_recent_first, oldest_first, most_popular.
parameters.Name: order

parameters.Description: The number of Touts to return per page.
parameters.Name: per_page

parameters.Description: The page of Touts to start on.
parameters.Name: page

methods.Synopsis: This method returns a list of the most recently posted Touts.

parameters.Description: The number of Touts to return per page.
parameters.Name: per_page

parameters.Description: The page of Touts to start on.
parameters.Name: page

methods.Synopsis: Featured Touts are selected by Tout. This method returns a list of featured Touts.

parameters.Description: The number of Touts to return per page.
parameters.Name: per_page

parameters.Description: The page of Touts to start on.
parameters.Name: page

methods.Synopsis: Authentication Required. This method lets the authenticated user of your app post Tout videos. Videos can be posted from either local file data or by referencing a URL of a remotely hosted video.

parameters.Description: The access token you received through the authentication process. This token needs to have WRITE scope and SHARE scope if including tout[shares] parameters
parameters.Name: access_token

parameters.Description: The data from a local video file to use for your Tout. The file must be in one of these formats: MPEG4, WebM, 3GPP, AVI, MPEGPS, WMV, and FLV and be no larger than 40 megabytes. This parameter MUST be present if tout[url] is absent.
parameters.Name: data

methods.Synopsis: Returns a Tout based on its uid. Allows your app to load and play a specific Tout.
Authentication required. This method lets the authenticated user of your app delete a posted Tout.

parameters.Description: The uid of the Tout you wish to delete.
parameters.Name: uid

parameters.Description: The access token you received through the authentication process. This token needs to have WRITE scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

methods.Synopsis: Authentication required. This method allows you to update the description text for an existing Tout.

parameters.Description: The uid of the Tout you wish to delete.
parameters.Name: uid

parameters.Description: The access token you received through the authentication process. This token needs to have WRITE scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

parameters.Description: The new text of the Tout. Must not exceed 255 characters
parameters.Name: text

methods.Synopsis: Authentication required. This method lets the authenticated user of your app like a Tout.
Authentication required. This method allows the authenticated user of your app to unlike a previously liked Tout.

parameters.Description: The uid of the Tout you wish to like.
parameters.Name: uid

parameters.Description: The access token you received through the authentication process. This token needs to have WRITE scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

methods.MethodName: Retrieve users who have liked a Tout
methods.Synopsis: This method returns a list of users who have liked a particular Tout.
A conversation is a back and forth exchange between users based on a Tout. This method returns the conversation around a specified Tout.
Authentication required. This method allows the authenticated user of your app to share Touts to Facebook, Twitter, email or SMS.
A conversation is a back and forth exchange between users based on a Tout. This conversation establishes its own uid. This method lets your app display a conversation.
Returns users who have created Touts within a conversation.
This method returns all Touts within a specified conversation.

parameters.Description: The uid of the conversation.
parameters.Name: uid

parameters.Description: The order in which the Touts are sorted. Must be one of the following: most_recent_first, oldest_first, alphabetical, reverse_alphabetical.
parameters.Name: order

parameters.Description: The number of Touts to return per page.
parameters.Name: per_page

parameters.Description: The page of Touts to start on.
parameters.Name: page

methods.Synopsis: This method returns a list of Touts related to a specified hashtag. Your app could display this data when a user clicks or searches a hashtag in your app.

parameters.Description: The uid of the hashtag.
parameters.Name: uid

parameters.Description: The access token you received through the authentication process. This token needs to have SHARE scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

parameters.Description: The order in which the Touts are sorted. Must be one of the following: most_recent_first, oldest_first, alphabetical, reverse_alphabetical.
parameters.Name: order

parameters.Description: The number of Touts to return per page.
parameters.Name: per_page

parameters.Description: The page of Touts to start on.
parameters.Name: page

methods.MethodName: Retrieve a list of trending hashtags
methods.Synopsis: This method returns a list of trending hashtags.

parameters.Description: The access token you received through the authentication process. This token needs to have SHARE scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

methods.Synopsis: This method allows your app to lookup hashtags based on a search string. It returns a list of suggested hashtags matching the search criteria.

parameters.Description: The access token you received through the authentication process. This token needs to have SHARE scope.
parameters.Name: access_token

parameters.Description: The string to search on. Must be at least 2 characters.
parameters.Name: q

parameters.Description: The maximum number of results to return.
parameters.Name: limit
